posts.post_title: Graded T206 for sale - SGC and PSA
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff Mohler
I have the following for sale.  Please email me for scans:

SGC 70 John Hummel (Sweet Cap) - $110.00
SGC 30 Joss (Pitching) (Polar Bear) - $80.00
PSA 4 George Bell (follow through) (Sovereign 460) - $60.00
PSA 4 Barney Pelty (vertical) Piedmont - $48.00
PSA 4 Frank Owen Piedmont ($48.00)
SGC 40 George McQuillan (with bat) $32.00  Great Front, Washed out back -                                                                     soaked??
SGC 40 Jimmy Dygert Piedmont $32.00
SGC 40 Joe Lake (New York) Sweet Cap  $32.00
SGC 40 Chappie Charles Piedmont $32.00
SGC 40 Ted Easterly $32.00

PSA 3 Nattress Sweet Cap  $32.00  Nice wide borders!
PSA 3 Jake Stahl No Glove Shows Piedmont $32.00
PSA 3 Wild Bill Donovan Throwing - $32.00

I will include shipping at these prices.

During the evening my email is rachelmohler@comcast.net
At work, email me at jeff.mohler@clymer.net
